import time

from ccpnmodel.ccpncore.memops.metamodel import XmlModelIo
from ccpnmodel.ccpncore.memops.metamodel.ModelPortal import ModelPortal



[docs]def getModelPortal(dataModelVersion=None, includePackageNames=None,
                   excludePackageNames=None):
  """ get adapted ModelPortal

  - dataModelVersion object of version to generate(default: current)
  - includePackageNames: package qualified names to generate from;
    only leaf package names should be put in includePackageNames.
  - excludePackageNames: qualified names of packages that will be
    ignored together with their contents.
  """
  # load model
  topPackage = XmlModelIo.readModel(dataModelVersion, includePackageNames=includePackageNames,
                                    excludePackageNames=excludePackageNames)

  start = time.time()
  modelPortal = ModelPortal(topPackage, dataModelVersion=dataModelVersion)
  end = time.time()
  print("""
  Memops made ModelPortal, time %s
  """ % (end - start))

  #
  return modelPortal


if __name__ == '__main__':
  dataModelVersion = None
  # includePackageNames = ['memops.Implementation', 'ccp.lims.Sample', 'ccp.lims.RefSampleComponent',
  #                        'ccp.general.DbRef', 'ccp.general.Taxonomy', 'ccp.general.Citation',
  #                        'ccp.general.Affiliation', 'ccp.general.DataLocation',
  #                        'ccp.molecule.Molecule', 'ccp.molecule.LabeledMolecule',
  #                        'ccp.molecule.ChemComp', 'ccp.molecule.ChemCompLabel', '...']
  includePackageNames = ['memops.Implementation',
                         'ccp.molecule.ChemElement',
                         'ccp.molecule.ChemComp',
                         'ccp.molecule.Stereochemistry',
                         ]
  excludePackageNames = []

  # load model
  modelPortal = getModelPortal(dataModelVersion, includePackageNames=includePackageNames,
                                    excludePackageNames=excludePackageNames)
